# ACTION

## Linters

| Linter                                      | Additional                                                                                                                     |
|---------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [actionlint (ACTION)](action_actionlint.md) | [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/rhysd/actionlint?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/rhysd/actionlint) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.yml`
  - `.yaml`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                    | Description                   | Default value |
|-----------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| ACTION_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| ACTION_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
